Dr. '''Simon C.P. Horobin''' is a Reader of Medieval English Language and Tutorial Fellow at [[University of Oxford|Magdalen College, Oxford]]. Before that, he served as lecturer in English Language at the [[wikipedia:University of Glasgow|University of Glasgow]]. His main field of study is Middle English, and [[wikipedia:Geoffrey Chaucer|Chaucer]] in particular.
